TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebReference extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Describes a reference to a collection of XML Web services.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A WebReference object is used to pass information about a set of Web services to the static <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.GenerateWebReferences%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class.
## Examples The following code example illustrates the use of this class.
[!code-cs[WebServices_GenerateWebReferences#0](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.services.de_33_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection documents, class System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace proxyCode) cil managed

Docs.param: A that specifies a collection of description documents.
A that specifies a namespace for code compilation.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given description document collection and proxy code namespace.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `documents` collection should contain only <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects; the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.GenerateWebReferences%2A> method is unable to interpret <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `documents` collection should contain only <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects; the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.GenerateWebReferences%2A> method is unable to interpret <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> objects.

Docs.summary: Gets the URL key of the web reference.
Docs.value: A containing the URL key of the Web reference.

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of description documents associated with the Web reference.
Docs.value: The used to initialize the instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The description document collection associated with a Web reference should contain only <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects; the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.GenerateWebReferences%2A> method is unable to interpret <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument> objects.
## Examples The following code example illustrates the use of this property. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference> class.
[!code-cs[WebServices_GenerateWebReferences#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.services.de_69_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the protocol associated with the Web reference.
Docs.value: A containing the name of the protocol associated with the Web reference.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Allowed protocol strings include "Soap" (indicating SOAP 1.0) and "Soap12" (indicating SOAP 1.2). The value of this property determines the protocol used by proxy clients when contacting any XML Web service in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference.Documents%2A> collection.
For more information on SOAP, see the World Wide Web Consortium Web site, at www.w3.org.
## Examples The following code example illustrates the use of this property. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference> class.
[!code-cs[WebServices_GenerateWebReferences#4](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.services.de_23_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Gets the code namespace associated with the Web reference.
Docs.value: The in which proxy code will be generated when the method is called.
